Shipping and Delivery Policy

At Aadhunik Technologies, we aim to ensure your orders are delivered promptly and efficiently. Here’s a detailed overview of our efficient, and effective shipping and delivery process:

Shipping Methods and Costs

We have multiple shipping options which will suit your needs and you can choose any of these:

  • Standard Shipping: This is affordable and reliable.
  • Express Shipping: Makes fast delivery for urgent needs.
  • Free Shipping: This is available for eligible areas and orders.

Shipping costs depend on the delivery destination, weight of the parcel, and size of your order. You will see the final shipping cost at checkout of your order purchase.

Delivery Times
  • Processing Time: Your Orders are processed within 2-3 working days.
  • Domestic Delivery: Usually takes 10-15 working days.
  • International Delivery: Delivery times vary by location and customs procedures.
Tracking Your Order

Once your order is shipped to be delivered to your place, you will receive an email with a tracking number. Use this number on the courier’s website to track your package.

Shipping Restrictions

While we aim to ship worldwide, some restrictions apply based on location. If we cannot ship to your address, you will be informed at checkout.

Handling Issues
  • Missed Deliveries: If no one is available to receive the delivery, the courier will attempt redelivery or leave a note for pickup.
  • Damaged Packages: If your package arrives damaged, please contact us immediately within 24 hours of the delivery. You will have to send us photos of the damage and in some cases videos too.
FAQs

Thank you for choosing Aadhunik Technologies. We are dedicated to providing our customers reliable and efficient shipping services.
